input.sentences: this was a very scary place for me .
the columbarium was where funeral urns are stored .
we went inside the columbarium it was dark and cold inside .

output.sentences: The path was quiet and peaceful.
Jack followed the signs to the Columbarium.
He walked down a long hallway.
When he entered, a stature outside rumbled ominously.
